Name: Hunting Moon vol.2
About the game: This is a Galgame/visual novel with a single character and a single ending. The playing time is about two hours. After meeting with Lilith for a while, she returned to her hometown of Devil because of something, and at the same time was a life-like doll sent by her as a souvenir. I thought it was just an ordinary (although not ordinary) gift, but I didn't expect the doll to be active at night. The day of living with a living puppet without a name and no heart starts like this. Disclaimer: All characters in this game are adults when the game plot occurs. There are no adult-only scenes in the game.
